body.p:
Christian von Hesse,
Attorney & Counsellor. Notary Public.
39 Nassau Street, New York, Jan 16, 1865

To his Excellency
Thos. E Bramlette
Governor of the State
of Kentucky
I hereby apply to your Excellency to appoint me a Commissioner for the State of Kentucky residing in the City of New York

I have the honor to remain
Your Excellencys
most obedient servant

Mr Von Hesse is highly
recommended to me by my friend Mr. Hall of New York City

R E Fulton
Governor of N. Y.

Comr Deeds
Christian von Hesse
New York
apptd
9th Feby 1865
